pci_ai_dashboard_private_docker_registri: You can choose to use an OVHcloud managed private registry with all the features of the open-source Harbor project to guarantee security. This service is available via the high-performance OVHcloud network to optimise your deployments.
You can also use your own Docker Registry.
pci_ai_dashboard_registries_description: A Docker registry allows you to store your software images so that you can easily access them during your training or deployments.
pci_ai_dashboard_private_docker_registri: You can manage your private Docker Registries here. You can then easily launch jobs and apps with these images.
pci_ai_dashboard_sared_registries_descri: By default, we store private images of your jobs on a Docker Registry managed by OVHcloud, and shared with our customers. The images stored on it can be deleted at any time. We recommend using your private registry to store your own images.
pci_ai_dashboard_shared_registry_select_: Select the region you want to use:
pci_ai_dashboard_shared_registry_help: The Docker Registry attached to the project can be used to host the private images needed to run jobs
pci_ai_dashboard_shared_registry_section: You can connect to the shared Docker Registry via the following command:
You can authenticate on the platform via all
within the same Public Cloud project.
You can then mark your images and upload them to the registry.
Your image can now be used in a job or app.
